title: WHERE THE DAMN SERVER TRANSFERS
body: IF YOU SAY YOURE GONNA DO SOMETHIGN THAN DO IT JESUS CHRIST

replies.body: They're still slated to come back shortly, just working out the kinks. We couldn't launch them until *all* regions were updated, and it'd be even more of a mess if it was rushed and didn't work 100% of course. There wasn't an exact date or time mentioned, just that they're back with patch 8.2.

yea but rito can say "well in the patch 8.2 we put the region transfere, but it wont be in the patch day, yea because this problem its not from 5 months jajjaa no obviusly not" u can say any date or hour please? its so hard do it like that???? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

They said "once Patch 8.2 drops."
Patch 8.2 has dropped already and has been for hours
And on every server as far as we've all been told, there are no further updates to the Service Status and I mentioned in my other post.

Even going as far to post the pinned thread saying that they're currently live giving dates for when the discounts start and finish.
I mean that's no surprise, the money and precautions they take to make sure it keeps flowing in is of utmost priority.

> They're still slated to come back shortly, just working out the kinks. We couldn't launch them until *all* regions were updated, and it'd be even more of a mess if it was rushed and didn't work 100% of course. There wasn't an exact date or time mentioned, just that they're back with patch 8.2.

We were supposed to have 2 weak discount so it should be enabled today. Redag propetly so people dont have any doubt's and give information like ETA. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R6GpOhUG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-24T22:58:58.462+0000)
>
> They're still slated to come back shortly, just working out the kinks. We couldn't launch them until *all* regions were updated, and it'd be even more of a mess if it was rushed and didn't work 100% of course. There wasn't an exact date or time mentioned, just that they're back with patch 8.2.

What happens if I have an NA account and OCE account both with skins and i transfer will they just swap?

You really shouldn't post mostly unrelated replies when a larger majority of people are trying to strangle out an actual real answer from these people. Come on now, you know they have a short attention span, don't avert their attention or give them reason to, because they jump for that like flies to honey if it lets them dodge important issues with the game - both on gameplay and technical levels.

"Account Transfers will be back with Patch 8.2 at a Discounted Rate of 50% off_

As stated in the article linked, account transfers will go live again once Patch 8.2 drops."


?????????????? THEY LEGIT SAID THEY WILL BE BACK WHEN THE PATCH DROPS, AND THEY "ARE" BACK. WHAT THE FUK
After almost 5 months? i dont think so

FALSE HOPES WE WANT A 90% DISCOUNT BECAUSE OF THIS TRECHERY
